body_html:
ngimelshein@dgx1-dvt-01:/mnt/shared/ngimel/tmp$ git clone https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git
Cloning into 'pytorch'...
remote: Counting objects: 45678, done.
remote: Compressing objects: 100% (38/38), done.
remote: Total 45678 (delta 12), reused 9 (delta 4), pack-reused 45636
Receiving objects: 100% (45678/45678), 17.34 MiB | 3.76 MiB/s, done.
Resolving deltas: 100% (34562/34562), done.
Checking connectivity... done.
Checking out files: 100% (1587/1587), done.
ngimelshein@dgx1-dvt-01:/mnt/shared/ngimel/tmp$ cd pytorch
ngimelshein@dgx1-dvt-01:/mnt/shared/ngimel/tmp/pytorch$ docker build -t pytorch_upstream -f tools/docker/Dockerfile9 .
Sending build context to Docker daemon  29.92MB

...

Step 10/14 : RUN git submodule update --init
 ---> Running in 6e169c6b6466
Submodule 'torch/lib/gloo' (https://github.com/facebookincubator/gloo) registered for path 'torch/lib/gloo'
Submodule 'torch/lib/nanopb' (https://github.com/nanopb/nanopb.git) registered for path 'torch/lib/nanopb'
Submodule 'torch/lib/pybind11' (https://github.com/pybind/pybind11) registered for path 'torch/lib/pybind11'
Cloning into 'torch/lib/gloo'...
Submodule path 'torch/lib/gloo': checked out '7fd607e2852c910f0f1320d2aaa92f1da2291109'
Cloning into 'torch/lib/nanopb'...
Submodule path 'torch/lib/nanopb': checked out '14efb1a47a496652ab08b1ebcefb0ea24ae4a5e4'
Cloning into 'torch/lib/pybind11'...
Submodule path 'torch/lib/pybind11': checked out '9f6a636e547fc70a02fa48436449aad67080698f'
 ---> 4b6a34474b41
Removing intermediate container 6e169c6b6466
Step 11/14 : RUN TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST="5.2 6.0 6.1 7.0+PTX" TORCH_NVCC_FLAGS="-Xfatbin -compress-all"     CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH="$(dirname $(which conda))/../"     pip install -v .
 ---> Running in 4b9a5911d441

May be try --no-cache option to docker build?
